About Amelia Jeffers Auctioneers & Appraisers

Amelia Jeffers Auctioneers & Appraisers provides professional art appraisal services in Columbus. With expertise in Art (all periods), Antiques, Hard-to-value assets, Estate settlements, Expert witness testimony, they offer reliable valuations for insurance, estate planning, and donations.
